name: Evil Mushroom
description: In the forest on the south side of the capital of the kingdom the influence of the Litch created these ravenous monsters. "the Tome of monsters and beasts" describes the Evil mushroom as a perfect hunter who camouflages himself in the environment of the forest flora, ruthless in the ways the Evil Mushroom attacks his prey suddenly opening his huge jaws and injecting poison into the larger prey through his sharp teeth, if it were not for carnivorous fairies that always flutter close to him it would be impossible to distinguish this creature from a normal mushroom. the speed of its bites makes it impossible to dodge them so if you do not pay enough attention you end up being first paralyzed and then dead within a few minutes.
